name: Magnetic Solutions
description:
In Magnetic Solution you control a robot changing positions of platforms to solve puzzles of getting to the end.

Controls

-A,D: left and right

-W or Space bar: Jumping

-LMB + Mouse: Move platforms

Mechanics:

Horizontal Platform: Platform that moves left and right.

Vertical Platform: Platform that moves up and down.

Platforms become locked when you stand preventing you from moving them while standing on them, they become unlocked when you step off.

Laser and gates: Lasers control the state of gates, blocked laser means the gate is open and you can walk through. Lasers can only blocked by platforms.
